scripts.clean: rimraf 'dist/*' && mkdir dist/public && cd ../frontend/ && npm run build
scripts.build: cd lib/xlsx_parser && npm run build && cd - && tsc --project tsconfig.json
scripts.start:dev: npm run clean && npm run build && concurrently "tsc --project tsconfig.json -w" "nodemon dist/server/index.js"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.comments: echo Note: pre,post hooks sometimes fail on stackblitz
